com.tineye.services
Class HttpUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.tineye.services.HttpUtils

public class HttpUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods for issuing HTTP GET and POST requests.

HTTP connections can be made with or without HTTP basic authentication crendentials. To use HTTP basic authentication, the host, port, username and password to the website being connected to must be provided.

Copyright (C) 2011-2012 Idee Inc. All rights reserved worldwide.

Constructor Detail

HttpUtils

public HttpUtils()
Construct an HttpUtils instance to issue HTTP requests.

HttpUtils

public HttpUtils(java.lang.String host,
                 int port,
                 java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String password)
Construct an HttpUtils instance to issue HTTP requests using HTTP basic authentication.

Parameters:
host - The hostname to use for HTTP basic authentication when connecting to website, this should be the domain name excluding "http://"
port - The port for HTTP basic authentication
username - The username for HTTP basic authentication
password - The password for HTTP basic authentication
Method Detail

doPost

public java.lang.String doPost(java.lang.String requestURL,
                               org.apache.http.entity.mime.MultipartEntity contentBody)
                        throws HttpUtilsException
Do an HTTP POST of the contentBody to the requestURL.

Parameters:
requestURL - The URL to issue the POST request to
contentBody - Body of POST request (including any files to upload)
Returns:
The server response string.
Throws:
HttpUtilsException - If there's an error issuing the POST request or parsing the response

doGet

public java.lang.String doGet(java.lang.String requestURL)
                       throws HttpUtilsException
Do an HTTP GET request to the requestURL.

Parameters:
requestURL - The URL to issue the GET request to
Returns:
The server response string.
Throws:
HttpUtilsException - If there's an error issuing the GET request or parsing the response
